name: copilot-self-improvement
description: A VS Code extension that provides project-specific instructions and conventions to GitHub Copilot via a dedicated tool.

languageModelTools.name: copilot-self-improvement-getInstructionsAndConventions
languageModelTools.description: Accesses local .github/instructions files to guide Copilot with project-specific standards and provides conventions for their use.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Use this tool to find special instructions, conventions, or guidance for the current project. It is the primary source for understanding project-specific coding standards, architectural patterns, or how to properly use internal libraries. Call this tool whenever a user asks about 'instructions', 'conventions', 'guidelines', or 'how to do something' in the context of the current workspace, especially before attempting to fix code or generate new features.

filterKeyword.description: An optional keyword to filter instructions.
